001package com.technototes.library.hardware2;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.PwmControl;
004import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.Servo;
005
006public class ServoBuilder extends HardwareBuilder<Servo> {
007    public ServoBuilder(String name) {
008        super(name);
009    }
010
011    public ServoBuilder(Servo device) {
012        super(device);
013    }
014
015    public ServoBuilder(int port) {
016        super(port);
017    }
018
019    public ServoBuilder direction(Servo.Direction dir) {
020        product.setDirection(dir);
021        return this;
022    }
023
024    public ServoBuilder forward() {
025        return direction(Servo.Direction.FORWARD);
026    }
027
028    public ServoBuilder reverse() {
029        return direction(Servo.Direction.REVERSE);
030    }
031
032    public ServoBuilder at(double position) {
033        product.setPosition(position);
034        return this;
035    }
036
037    public ServoBuilder range(double min, double max) {
038        product.scaleRange(min, max);
039        return this;
040    }
041
042    public ServoBuilder pwmRange(double min, double max) {
043        if (product instanceof PwmControl) ((PwmControl) product).setPwmRange(new PwmControl.PwmRange(min, max));
044        else
045            throw new UnsupportedOperationException(
046                    "scaling pwm range only supported on devices that implement pwmcontrol");
047        return this;
048    }
049
050    public ServoBuilder expandedPWM() {
051        return pwmRange(500, 2500);
052    }
053}
